articles.title: Akasa Air Begins Operations From Kolkata, Allows Pets On The Plane - Times Now
articles.description: The airline started non-stop flights between Kolkata and Guwahati and Bengaluru. In the inaugural flight, 174 passengers travelled from Kolkata to Assam's largest city and 167 arrived in Kolkata from the Karnataka capital.
